body:
Day 19 - 426*
Stiff? The almost every panel in which the Smurf appears is reused. Look at page 3, 5, 9, 13, 17, 23 and 27 the smiling asshole is exactly the same. And on pages 3 and 9, one panel is reused. And on pages 5 and 9.That's just being lazy.
0/10.
I mean it was hot but also kinda not 5/10
